item.title: ネットブロック：ロシアの少なくとも5つの通信会社がグーグルニュースをブロックし、他のいくつかのISPもアクセスを減らしている。
item.description:
Nico Grant / New York Times:
NetBlocks: at least five Russian telcos block Google News and several other ISPs are reducing access, as Russia's feud with a mercenary leader intensifies  —  At least five telecommunications companies have blocked the service, which aggregates news from various sources, according to an analysis from NetBlocks, an internet observatory.

item.title: ブルームバーグ、ダウ・ジョーンズ、NYT、FTが、FTXの顧客名秘匿を認めた判決を不服とし、情報開示規範の「包括的例外」は認められないと主張（Dietrich Knauth/Reuters）
item.description:
Dietrich Knauth / Reuters:
Bloomberg, Dow Jones, NYT, and FT appeal a ruling that allows FTX to keep customer names secret, arguing it can't get a “sweeping exception” to disclosure norms  —  A group of media organizations on Friday appealed a court decision that allows collapsed crypto exchange FTX …

item.title: 社内メール：グーグルは、YouTubeのサイトやアプリを通じてスタック・バウンスのようなゲームを即座にプレイできる「プレイアブルズ（Playables）」と呼ばれる製品のテストに従業員を招待した（Miles Kruppa/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Miles Kruppa / Wall Street Journal:
Internal email: Google invited employees to test a product called Playables, which lets users play games like Stack Bounce instantly via the YouTube site or app  —  The new service, called ‘Playables,’ is part of CEO's push into new areas amid advertising slowdown

item.title: YouTubeは、グーグルのArea 120で開発されたAI搭載の吹き替えツールAloudを、英語、スペイン語、ポルトガル語から始めて、「数百人」のクリエイターとテストしている（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
YouTube is testing Aloud, an AI-powered dubbing tool developed at Google's Area 120, with “hundreds” of creators, starting with English, Spanish, and Portuguese  —  YouTube wants to make it easier to dub your videos in other languages by giving you some help with AI.

item.title: バリー・ディラーIAC会長、デイリービーストは売却対象ではないと発表、アンクラー・メディアと交渉していたが撤退（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
IAC Chairman Barry Diller says The Daily Beast is not for sale; he had been in talks with Ankler Media but has withdrawn from them  —  Mr. Diller said he had considered combining The Daily Beast with Ankler Media, a start-up co-founded by Janice Min, a longtime magazine editor.

item.title: DGA会員による新契約の批准投票が行われ、87％が賛成票を投じる。契約には、海外ストリーミングの残額76％増が含まれる（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
DGA members vote to ratify their new contract, with 87% voting in favor; the contract includes a 76% increase in foreign streaming residuals  —  Members of the Directors Guild of America have voted to ratify their new contract, bringing the industry one step closer to achieving labor peace.

item.title: 情報筋ターナー・クラシック・ムービーズはワーナー・ブラザース映画CEOのマイケル・デ・ルカとパメラ・アビーが監督することになり、WBDは同チャンネルの売却を検討しない（The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
Sources: Turner Classic Movies will now be overseen by Warner Bros. Pictures CEOs Michael De Luca and Pamela Abdy; WBD will not consider selling the channel  —  Putting the filmmaker friendly executives in charge is meant to reassure the film community, which has expressed concern after the exit of TCM boss Pola Changnon.

item.title: WBDのデヴィッド・ザスラブCEOがターナー・クラシック・ムービーズのスタッフを削減し、映画界の巨頭のような風貌を装っているが、これは彼の最も邪悪で破滅的な作戦のひとつだ（Lisa Laman/Collider）
item.description:
Lisa Laman / Collider:
WBD CEO David Zaslav's gutting of staff at Turner Classic Movies, while he adopts a movie mogul's persona, is one of his most wicked and devastating maneuvers  —  The staff behind Turner Classic Movies has been gutted, which will have enormous consequences for cinema as an art form.

item.title: Googleは5月に発表した後、YouTubeやRedditなどに投稿された情報を掲載する「視点」タブを検索結果に追加した（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Google adds a Perspectives tab to search results, with information that people have posted on YouTube, Reddit, and more, after announcing the feature in May  —  Google's new search feature that shows you different perspectives (ideally, human ones) in search results will be available on Friday, the company said on Twitter.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAのストライキの可能性が迫る中、マーベル、ネットフリックス、ソニー・ピクチャーズ、その他のスタジオは、7月19日から始まるサンディエゴのコミコンでのパネルをスキップする予定だ（Adam B. Vary/Variety）
item.description:
Adam B. Vary / Variety:
With a potential SAG-AFTRA strike looming, Marvel, Netflix, Sony Pictures, and other studios plan to skip panels at San Diego's Comic-Con, which starts July 19  —  For two years, the biggest annual fan convention in North America was forced to cancel the five-day gathering due to the COVID-19 pandemic …

item.title: リトアニアの通信規制当局が、RTを含むロシアのTVチャンネルに結びついたIPアドレスのブロックを開始、禁止されているロシアのチャンネルのストリーミングを事実上遮断（Matthew Keys/The Desk）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Lithuania's telecoms regulator starts blocking IP addresses tied to Russian TV channels including RT, effectively blocking streaming of banned Russian channels  —  The ban comes amid continued economic pressures, including sanctions, imposed on Russia by the European Union.  —  By: Matthew KeysJune 23, 2023,

item.title: 現役選手や元選手が番組やポッドキャストの司会、カラー解説などを学ぶ、2日間のNBA選手キャンプ「Broadcaster U.」の様子（New York Times紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
A look at Broadcaster U., a two-day NBA players' camp, where current and former players learn to host a show or podcast, provide color commentary, and more  —  A two-day camp trains current and former basketball players in the lucrative art of broadcasting, podcasting and throwing verbal bombs on camera.

item.title: レポート：6月22日、Altice USA傘下のCheddar Newsがレイオフされ、約12人が影響を受けた。4月には、CheddarのYouTubeチームのスタッフ約6人が削減された（Marvie Basilan/International Business ...）
item.description:
Marvie Basilan / International Business Times:
Report: layoffs hit Altice USA-owned Cheddar News on June 22, affecting around a dozen people; in April, around six staffers for Cheddar's YouTube team were cut  —  KEY POINTS  —  News network Cheddar News reportedly slashed several jobs Thursday, including numerous producers and two longtime anchors.

item.title: グルジア大統領、2022年に放送局ディレクターとしての職権乱用で有罪判決を受けた同国唯一の収監中ジャーナリスト、ニカ・グバラミア氏を恩赦（ボイス・オブ・アメリカ）
item.description:
Voice of America:
Georgia's president pardons the country's only jailed journalist, Nika Gvaramia, who was convicted in 2022 for abuse of power as the director of a broadcaster  —  Greeted by cheering crowds and surrounded by journalists, including from his own station, one of Georgia's most prominent journalists walked …

item.title: 米国の地方記者500人以上を対象とした調査：~72％が個人的な燃え尽きを経験し、70％が仕事上の燃え尽きを報告、72％が退職を検討（Elizabeth Djinis/Poynter）
item.description:
Elizabeth Djinis / Poynter:
Survey of 500+ local journalists in the US: ~72% reported experiencing personal burnout, 70% reported work-related burnout, and 72% considered leaving their job  —  Recent surveys and academic work show how widespread burnout is among local reporters and offer hopeful solutions ... for newsrooms willing to take them
